pages.text: The Fluid Tank Minecart can be used to store fluids. The cart starts with 32,000mb of capacity, which can be improved using augments. It can only store one fluid at a time. You can manually add or remove fluid from the cart by using compatible containers such as buckets.

The Fluid Tank Minecart can be right clicked with buckets to fill or empty it one bucket at a time. Beware that there is currently a bug with Forge where trying to bucket a non-bucketable fluid voids your bucket! Stay posted for a transfer rail which will allow for some interesting logistics!
